sense.def:
The difference between things
je način, po katerem se stvari med seboj razlikujejo.

seg.quote: There is an essential difference between computers and humans.
Look at their difference in size.

sense.def:
The difference between two amounts
je količina, za katero je en znesek manjši ali večji od drugega.

Kadar ljudje
have their differences
, se z nečim ne strinjajo.

Kadar nekaj
makes a difference
, spremeni neki položaj.

seg.quote: It makes no difference whether he is a citizen or not.
